description.en: A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.ja: 1mmでも図に乗った事がある元天才の君へ1万年に1人の天才魔女“ナユ”の魔力が枯れた！？天才ゆえに許されてきたあれやこれのツケが、今ブーメランのように突き刺さっていく…そんなナユが助けを求めたのは、自分のことが大好きな教え子の小麦くん。だいぶ痛いけどなんだか放って置けない奇妙な2人の共同生活が始まった！
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

description.en:
A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)

---
**Notice:** The chapter numbering of Company and Private Life will be pushed back/changed. Please do not be alarmed with this change. Thank you.
description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.

altTitles.en: Secretly, Secretly; But Unable to Hide It

description.en: That year, someone secretly wormed their way into Sang Zhi's heart and she fell in love with her brother's friend Duan Jiaxu. That older brother has beautiful peachy eyes and casually calls her a "kid". That spark of surprise when they first met made Sang Zhi want to slowly get closer to him, but the 7-year age difference felt like an insurmountable gap that she couldn't cross over. Not knowing when it started, the crush buried at the bottom of her heart sprouted, and slowly, it spread into his heart too...
description.zh: 那年，桑稚的心里偷偷地住进了一个人，喜欢上哥哥的朋友段嘉许，这个大哥哥有着好看的桃花眼，漫不经心的喊她“小孩”，初见的惊艳总是让桑稚忍不住想要靠近，但是7岁的年龄差仿佛又是他们无法逾越的鸿沟，不知从何时起，埋藏在心底的青涩暗恋逐渐发芽，慢慢地，也蔓延进了他的心里...【

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en: Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!
description.pt-br: Depois que sua vila foi atacada por um bando de ladrões, Lynn se levantou para proteger seus amigos e o mundo com a ajuda de uma Espada Mágica, que contém a alma de um herói...? Uma história de fantasia/ação com uma heroína sem precedentes(?)

description.en: Sakuma Yukari decided to start a band on her own after seeing a certain band during the Sakura High School festival, then with her best friend Shimizu Kaede, they want to join the Light Music Club only to discover that in their school there isn't a club like that. With help from Sawabe Maho, they discover there is a Light Music Appreciation Society with only one member, Satou Riko.
description.pt-br: Sakuma Yukari decidiu começar uma banda sozinha depois de ver uma certa banda durante o festival Sakura High School, então com sua melhor amiga Shimizu Kaede, eles querem se juntar ao Clube De Músicas Leves apenas para descobrir que em sua escola não há um clube assim. Com a ajuda de Sawabe Maho, eles descobrem que existe uma Sociedade de Apreciação de Música Leve com apenas um membro, Satou Riko.

description.en:
The noble prince falls in love with a humble commoner! A confinement of possession begins, like the game of cat and mouse… But you can't stop love, a soft bite, is my property.

---

Official English: [WebComics](http://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5f2bd8e88c252b2eb429683a), [MangaToon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/599375), [Pocket Comics](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)  
Official: [Japanese](https://www.comico.jp/articleList.nhn?titleNo=29866), [Vietnamese](https://www.comico.vn/title/124)

altTitles.es: No subestimes al personaje de apoyo

description.en:
Hyejung loved to read to escape her daily stress. But that's before she woke up inside the bizarre world of her favorite novel! Instead of the main heroine who courts three eligible men, she is now Latte Ectrie - a minor villain that everyone hates?! One way or another, it's a chance to live out her most beloved storyline, with popcorn in hand to watch all the drama! Taking charge of the narrative takes on a whole new meaning!

---

**Contents:** 139 + 30 (epilogue) + 9 (side story) = 178 chapters
- **Vol. 1:** main story (ch. 1-139)
- **Vol. 2:** epilogue (ch. 140-169)
- **Vol. 3:** side story (ch. 170-178)

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (Peanutoon)](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/5005)
- [Alternative Raw (BookCube)](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=180108)
- [Alternative Raw (RidiBooks)](https://ridibooks.com/books/3092002965)
- [Alternative Raw (Bomtoon)](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/informal)
- [Alternative Raw (Comico)](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1704)
- [Alternative Raw (Mr.Blue)](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_bridemaid_wz)
- [Alternative Raw (Naver)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=3400839)
- [Alternative Raw (Lezhin)](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/ms_looking)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/2213)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Terjebak-Peran-Figuran/2646)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/3983)
- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/miss-second-role)
description.fr: Elle se réveille un jour dans son roman préféré. Ce serait l'occasion de briller, sauf qu'on lui a donné un rôle de potiche absolue ! Aucun moyen d'approcher l'héroïne ni les 3 hommes qui lui tournent autour comme des mouches. Pas grave, elle arrivera coûte que coûte à exister ici !
description.id: Aku, bertemu dengan tiga pria ganteng seantero negeri. Putera mahkota, Bangsawan termuda sampai pemilik neraka sihir, Mereka semua mendambakan satu orang perempuan, Evelyn. Dia adalah temanku. Ketiga pria itu mendekati Evelyn dengan cara masing-masing. Lalu aku? Hanya menonton di pojokan saja. Bentar... Sepertinya aku pernah melihat eh maksudku membaca adegan ini.. Apa?! ruapanya aku berada di dalam dunia novel kesukaanku??!!
description.ja: 突然の目眩に襲われて目覚めると愛読していた小説の世界に引き込まれてしまった！？しかも女主人公をいじめる雑魚キャラ「ラテ・アクトリー」に転生…！！ どうせ人生唯一の楽しみである小説がリアルに堪能できれば満足と思いきや… 傍観者でいるつもりがだんだん目立ち始める「ラテ」 果たしてイケメンとの恋は成就するのか…！？
description.ko:
깨어나보니 내가 가장 좋아하는 소설 속에 들어와 버렸다!
그런데 주인공도 악역도 아닌… 눈물 나는 분량의 ‘들러리’라고?

현실에 치여사는 스물 다섯 학원 강사 김혜정! 그런데 즐겨 읽던 소설 <야수의 꽃> 세계로 떨어져 소설 속 인물 ‘라테 엑트리’가 된다.

…그런데 기왕 들어오게 해 준거 소설 속 미남들과 썸 좀 타는 주인공이 되게 해주지. 
여주인공을 괴롭히다 털릴 예정의 조연 라테 엑트리가 되어버리다니! 
에휴~ 그러면 그렇지 내 팔자야.

그래, 기왕 이렇게 된 거 열심히 구경이나 하자!
어차피 소설 보는 재미로 살아왔던 인생! 소설이 눈앞에서 실현된다는데 어찌 마다하겠는가! 
팝콘이나 먹으며 구경하지 뭐. 와작!

그런데 조연이었던 라테는 오히려 소설 속에서 자신의 존재감을 점점 내보이게 되는데…? 
소설 속의 들러리양의 파란만장한 구경기가 시작된다!
description.zh: 一睁开眼…竟然穿越到了我最近在追的小说里？可是为啥不按套路出牌，没有女主命的我竟然穿越到一个没有一丁点戏份的悲催小配角身上？事已至此我还是努力给自己加戏吧！抢在女主出场前跟三个男主来一场完美的邂逅，实现穿越人生的逆袭之路！

description.en:
Kannonji Suiren, she is the star of the school, a perfect person with talent and beauty. However, she is actually a hardcore lover of Yuri and spends her days in agony, desperately chewing on her favorite yuri couple, Fuchu Ajisai and Nakameguro Tsubaki, in her brain so that the people around her don't know about her secret interest!  
  
[Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaeru_dx)
description.ja: 観音寺睡蓮。才色兼備の完璧超人、学園のスターである。しかし彼女、実は「病的なまでの百合好き」であり、お気に入り百合ップルである府中紫陽花と中目黒椿の二人の供給を周囲に悟られぬよう、脳内で必死に噛み締める苦悩の日々を過ごしているのであった…！

title.en: I Saved the Whole Sect by Playing Badly

altTitles.en: The Junior Sister Is Obviously Super Strong, yet She Is So Dense

altTitles.zh: 小师妹明明超强却过分沙雕

description.en: "Well then, I choose to be rotten bad!" Transmigrating into a book, Ye Qiao wanted to escape the fate of the cannon fodder* side female character, she left the mountain to join the new sect. Unexpectedly, she was not only taken as a direct disciple, but she was also given four Senior Brothers who doted her to no end. From then on, Ye Qiao decided to take the Senior Brothers away from the original female lead, and would go against the Heavens' will to change their fates!

title.en: The Crazy Killer Whale’s Favourite Penguin

description.en:
Born as a penguin, I miraculously transformed into a human. The problem? My guardian, the Tower Master, hates beastmen. Fearing discovery, I ran away, only to be found out by a self-proclaimed penguin enthusiast.

Whale clan orca beastman, Suuradel, looked at me intensely, his eyes reddening sensually.

“Ha… Your wild eyes are incredible.”

Those aren’t eyes, just white feathers.

“May I touch your belly fat?”

Seriously? Furious, I pecked at him, but he looked oddly elated.

“Did you just kiss me?”

…It seems I got caught by a lunatic, not a penguin enthusiast.

title.en: Haitatsusaki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru

altTitles.ja: 配達先のお姉さんが怖すぎる

altTitles.en: The Delivery Destination Onee-san Is Too Scary

altTitles.ja: 配達先のお姉さんが怖すぎる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Haitatsusaki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru Hanashi
Haitatsu-saki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of This Scary Consignee Girl
The Story of a Scary Consignee
The Delivery Destination Onee-san Is Too Scary Story

altTitles.es-la: La Historia de un destinatario aterrador

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về cô nàng nhận hàng đáng sợ

description.en: An introverted part-time food delivery guy working in the countryside receives a food delivery order. When he reaches the delivery address, he discovers that the recipient is a tall and intimidating-like woman. However, as the story unfolds, he eventually discovers…
description.es-la: Un introvertido repartidor de comida a tiempo parcial que trabaja en el campo recibe un pedido de comida a domicilio. Cuando llega a la dirección de entrega, descubre que la destinataria es una mujer alta y de aspecto intimidatorio. Sin embargo, a medida que avanza la historia, descubrirá que...

description.en: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

title.en: The Supporting Female Is Reborn, She Will No Longer Serve This Broken Plot

altTitles.zh: 女配重生，这破剧情她不伺候了

description.en:
Description
Yin Susu couldn't believe that she was reborn again, her life was repeating again, the setting was the same, the painful things were the same.

She thought that she would just become a salted fish,* living a lazy life, waiting for death, waiting for everything to end, for the female lead to die, which would mean the end of everything, but she did not want to accept her fate!

"If you, the female lead, has a golden hand, then I will break that golden hand."

*salted fish: metaphor of a corpse or a person who doesn't want to do anything.

After being murdered and reborn, An Zhi vowed to take revenge on the scumbag and the bitch, but accidentally "tarnished" the innocence of Pei Que, a banished immortal in the capital. An Zhi felt ashamed because Pei Que was not only handsome, but she also called him fourth uncle in her previous life. Until one day, An Zhi accidentally discovered his secret. It turned out that he had been plotting against her for a long time, and his previous kindness was a sweet trap for him to keep her captive.

title.en: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.ja: センパイ！わざとじゃないんです！

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.en: Senpai! I Didn't Do It on Purpose!

description.en:
Sachi, a high school student, is confessed to by her love Jun, a senior who is a year older than her, and they are finally going out! However, as soon as she realizes that she is in love with Jun, Sachi has a constitution that causes her to have accidental pervert incidents with him every chance she gets! When Sachi tries to hold his hand for the first time, she accidentally puts her hand down his pants and she ends up deeply misunderstanding Jun when he asks her to pull out her hand. 

It's a sexy cute☆romantic comedy!
description.ja: 女子高生・幸は一学年上の憧れの先輩・純に告白されて、晴れて付き合えることに！ ところが両思いになった途端、幸は純に対して事あるごとにラッキースケベを起こしてしまう体質になってしまい…！? はじめて手を握ろうとしたら、勢いあまって彼のズボンに手を突っ込んでしまい違うものを握ってしまったり、あまつさえ手を抜こうとしたら手で抜こうとしてしまったりする、そんな一組のカップルが織りなすエロカワ☆ラブコメディです。
description.ru: Старшеклассница Сати наконец начинает встречаться с Дзюном, парнем который старше её на год. Она первая призналась, а теперь каждый раз, когда её переполняют чувства любви, богатые формы так и норовят создать неловкую ситуацию! Первая попытка Сати взяться за руки, случайно превращается в нырок в штаны Дзюна, оставляя его в полном недоумении. Встречайте эро-кавай ☆ лавком мангу!

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

Sunghoon was a normal high schooler until one day, he finds out he is engaged to a tiger from Korean mythology. It is foretold that the world will end unless Sunghoon marries the tiger. This story begins with the cute smile of the tiger girl.  
  
*Notice: This series reads like a manga, from right-to-left.*

altTitles.en: Let's Have a Toast With Miso Soup!

description.en:
Zenichirou is a middle school student raised in a motherless family. His breakfast always consists of onigiri and instant miso soup from the convenience store. Yae, a childhood friend of Zenichirou, cannot stand to see him eat such an innutritious breakfast, so she decides to make him breakfast every morning…  
  
This story conveys a simple message: eating with another person makes miso soup taste more delicious and hearty!

altTitles.ja: しゅがー・みーつ・がーる！

description.en:
A Sweet and Juicy Girls' Comedy~

Featuring:

Sato Kanna, daughter of a yakuza boss, she's known for being loyal to her friends and her slightly delinquent appearance.

And Mochizuki Mito, class president and the school's most envied upon young lady.

Just what unexpected secrets did these two girls found out about each other!?
description.es: Una dulce y jugosa comedia de chicas~ Presentación: Sato Kanna, hija de un jefe yakuza, es conocida por ser leal a sus amigos y por su aspecto ligeramente delincuente. Y Mochizuki Mito, presidenta de la clase y la joven más envidiada de la escuela. ¿Qué secretos inesperados habrán descubierto estas dos chicas la una sobre la otra?
description.es-la: Una dulce y jugosa comedia de chicas~ Presentación: Sato Kanna, hija de un jefe yakuza, es conocida por ser leal a sus amigos y por su aspecto ligeramente delincuente. Y Mochizuki Mito, presidenta de la clase y la joven más envidiada de la escuela. ¿Qué secretos inesperados habrán descubierto estas dos chicas la una sobre la otra?

altTitles.ja: フルメタル・パニック!

description.en: Trouble always seems to follow the beautiful and sassy, Kaname Chidori. Though she is only a high-school student, Kaname is constantly the target of terrorism. Lucky for her though, the dreamy Sosuke, an undercover agent from Mithril, is one step behind her, ready to protect her at any cost. But will he be able to save her from harm every time she is in trouble?
description.es-la: Los problemas siempre parecen perseguir a la bella y atrevida Kaname Chidori. Aunque solo es una estudiante de preparatoria, Kaname es constantemente el blanco del terrorismo. Sin embargo, por suerte para ella, el soñador Sosuke, un agente encubierto de Mithril, está un paso detrás de ella, listo para protegerla a cualquier costo. Pero, ¿podrá salvarla del daño cada vez que esté en problemas?

title.en: Even Though I Transmigrated as a Villainess, I'd Rather Raise a Cat

altTitles.en: I Reincarnated as a Villainess, but Why Did I Become a Cat Butler Instead?
Even Though I Possessed a Villain, I Still Want to Raise a Cat

description.en:
I transmigrated as Rowaine, the villainess who was executed for abusing a werebeast. In order to escape death, I decided to replace my sister Linier in her arranged marriage.

The problem is that Duke Blois, the groom, is a cat werebeast who is known as a bloodthirsty battlefield monster…

“My dear, I heard your hobbies include abusing werebeasts like myself.”

“I haven’t heard of such a condition stating that women who abused werebeasts could not be Your Grace’s wife, though.”

His emerald eyes flashed dangerously at me, I quickly kept speaking before he could say anything.

“If my hobby is a problem, then I promise that I will never abuse you, Your Grace.”

“Ha– what?”

This is the story of a ten-year contractual marriage between a cat lover and a prickly cat werebeast.

altTitles.zh: 神乎其技 - 特效化妝師

description.en: Kohei Nagase is an prodigy special effects artist. He and pro stuntman, Shingo Kannazuki, form Studio Gimmick. Together, they help people in need of Studio Gimmick's exceptional services. These people's problems are often able to be solved with Kohei's stunning special effects skills.

An RPG-style high school comedy set in present-day Japan, centering around Shiromado Hijiri, a very serious White Mage, and Michibikari Yuuto, a motivationless Hero.

Watch as they futilely struggle to raise the level of the hopeless Hero, day in and day out, in order to one day defeat the Demon Lord.

Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, 
but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. 
However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja:
「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。
家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。
人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？
全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！
陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

title.en: This Life Starts as a Child Actor

altTitles.en: Acting the Child Role at the Start of This Life
Beginning as the Child Actor in This Life
I'm Going to Be the Child Actor in This Life
This Life Starts as Child Actor
This Life Starts From a Child Role

description.en:
Was this life a failure? On the contrary, I like it! Kang Su-hyun, who has failed in everything he has done in life for four years. He finally found his calling as an actor and thought he was seeing the light, but he collided with a truck coming from the opposite side and despaired as death approached...

“Wait a minute, didn’t I die?”

When he regained consciousness, was his appearance reflected in the mirror the cutest version of himself from when he was 5 years old? Yes, in this life I start as a child actor!

Kang Su-hyun's acting career begins.

title.en: Love Letter -Yamamoto Souichirou Short Story Collection-

altTitles.ja: 恋文－山本崇一朗短編集－

altTitles.en: Love Letter - Soichiro Yamamoto Short Story Collection -

altTitles.ja: まちにまったおとなりさん
松本エーコは普通の子

altTitles.ja-ro: Matsumoto Eiko wa Futsuu no Ko
Matsumoto Ēko wa Futsuu no Ko
Matsumoto Ēko ha Futsuu no Ko

altTitles.en: Matsumoto Eiko Is An Average Girl
Eiko Matsumoto Is an Average Girl

description.en:
Contents:
1. **Love Letter** (恋文, Koibumi)
Okamoto, a young middle schooler, wants to confess his love to a girl named Kamiyama through a love letter. However, things go out of his plan when Kamiyama shocks him with an unthinkable request.

2. **The Long-Awaited Neighbor** (まちにまったおとなりさん, Machi ni Matta Otonari-san)

3. **Middle-Aged Cat Guy** (ネコのおっさん, Neko no Ossan)
Kazuki's sister brings home a stray cat, who is actually a middle aged man in disguise.

4. **Wish For Sasa ★** (ササに願いを★, Sasa ni Negai o ★)

5. **Kaijuu Lizard** (怪獣のトカゲ, Kaijuu no Tokage)
Venturing into the hills to find her dog who ran away, Hitomi finds a strange lizard girl who is feeling lonely.

6. **Matsumoto Eiko Is an Average Girl** (松本エーコは普通の子, Matsumoto Eiko wa Futsuu no Ko)
A girl's quest to become more interesting to catch her crush's attention.

7. **Witch in Training** (みならいウィッチ, Minarai Witch)
Spring has arrived. Having just turned 13, the young witch Koharu has embarked on the traditional journey of independence. Now, she just needs someplace to crash.

Yuhyeon becomes the youngest CEO of Hansung, a successful electronics company built on toxic work culture, but nobody he cares about is there to celebrate with him. After a night of drinking and wondering if he could change the past, he wakes up the next morning, 20 years younger at the beginning of his career.Armed with the experience and insights that made him CEO, Yuhyeon begins to revisit broken relationships and battle the enablers of Hansung’s cut-throat work environment. But he does not yet know how changing the past will affect his future...  (Source: Webtoons)

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=751168)

---
**Official Translations:** [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/drama/a-mans-man/list?title_no=2876), [Chinese (Simplified Characters) / 汉语](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/nanzihan/list?title_no=1548), [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/city-office/a-mans-man/list?title_no=3278),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/the-man/list?title_no=2257), [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001100)
description.ru: Хан Ю Хён, лучший офисный работник на небесах и на земле. Потеряв все, он вернулся в прошлое и изменил свою жизнь!

title.en: Kusobitch na Gal Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Kusobitch na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
Kusobicchi na Gyaru Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi
Kusobicchi na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gal Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gyaru Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Bitchy Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

description.en:
Akira, a young yakitori shop owner, has fallen in love with Houka, a bunny girl who often eats at his restaurant. But how can he get close to her when he has to focus on the grill‽ And there are 4 other bunny girls that look just like her‽
___
Serialization of the popular [*Aokishi Bunny*](https://mangadex.org/title/5fc86cdc-ade2-472b-b077-c9f92beb213d/aokishi-bunny) chapter. 
___
Note: “Piccolina” is short for “Picco di Stellina”, which means “Starlet Peak” or “Peak of the Starlet” in Italian.
description.pt-br: Cinco garotas bonitas em trajes de coelho visitam uma churrascaria todas as noites, encantando o cozinheiro. O dono se sente atraído por uma delas, mas não há muitas abordagens possíveis para ele fazer, pois não pode sair da cozinha. Este mangá retrata a história de amor saudável de um dono de restaurante.

altTitles.en: My First Girlfriend is a Gal

altTitles.pt-br: Minha primeira namorada é uma Gal!

description.en: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected. A series of "firsts" begins!
description.pt-br: Junichi Hashiba é um jovem colegial virgem que está desesperado para perder esse status. Sob pressão de seus amigos, o garoto acaba se declarando para Yukana Yame. Surpreendentemente a garota aceita  e um casal é formado. Porém, Jun acaba se encontrando em águas desconhecidas com Yame, que é uma gyaru (um tipo de moda urbana japonesa). Enquanto ele fantasia em perder a sua virgindade, ela se mostra mais normal e inocente do que ele imaginava.

altTitles.es-la: Subiendo de nivel con las mejores habilidades

description.en:
In the year 2020, humanity faces a crisis as Earth is attacked by unidentified monsters. Players prepare for the attack by challenging the Labyrinth that appeared. They can choose four options:

Easy Mode, where anyone can survive; Normal Mode, where you must work to survive; Hard Mode, where only 1% could survive; and Solo Mode, the harshest difficulty.

Kang TaeSan, the strongest Easy Mode player cleared the Labyrinth using an unconventional approach and acquired skills others could not: [ Addition, Multiplication, Attack Nullification, Ultimate Judgement...].

But because he chose Easy Mode, his power was lacking. Unable to prevent the extinction of humanity, he lay dying. A miraculous chance appears.

"This time I'll definitely become stronger."

Challenging the Labyrinth again, this is Skill-based Player Kang TaeSan's Solo Mode Attack Record!

altTitles.th: ยุคแห่งความโอหัง

description.ar: سيد بيرباز، الذي قاد الحرب التي استمرت 28 عامًا إلى النصر، "آشا بيرباز". بالنسبة لبيرفاز، الذي دمرته الحرب الطويلة، تتوجه آشا إلى العائلة الإمبراطورية لتلقي مكافأة النصر التي وعد بها الإمبراطور. ومع ذلك، فإن المكافأة الوحيدة التي عادت كانت <الحق في اختيار شريك الزواج>. كخيار أفضل، أشار آشا إلى "دوق كارلايل هافن"، وهو الأمير الأول الذي تم حرمانه مؤخرًا من لقب ولي العهد. إذا تم رفضها، كانت تنوي الحصول على نفقة من الإمبراطور... "ماركيز بيرباز. سأقبل عرض زواجك". وعلى عكس التوقعات، قبل دوق كارلايل اختيار آشا. وعود بدعم هائل لبيرفاز...!
description.en:
The lord of Pervaz, who led the 28-year war to victory, Asha Pervaz. 

For Pervaz, who was devastated by the long war, Asha heads to the imperial family to receive the victory reward promised by the emperor.  However, the only reward that came back was the "right to choose a marriage partner." 

As the best choice, Asha pointed out the Duke of Carlisle Haven, the first prince who had recently been deprived of the title of crown prince.  If she was refused, she intended to receive compensation from the emperor... 

"Marquise Perbaz. I will accept your marriage proposal." 

Contrary to expectations, the Duke of Carlisle accepted Asha's choice.  Promising tremendous support for Pervaz...!

---
After winning a long war, Asha Pervaz is expecting the emperor to compensate her with money. Unlike her expectations though, the emperor asks Asha to choose her own husband from a list of nobles. Asha chooses Duke Carlisle Haven, the emperor’s eldest son and former crown prince. Asha expects him to object and pay an alimony instead, but the duke actually agrees to marry her! He even promises to help Asha rebuild Pervaz. What does the duke really want? And will Asha get what she wants without getting embroiled in the growing royal conspiracy?
description.fr: Après avoir mis fin à la longue guerre contre les Lurs, Asha Pervaz, Seigneure des terres de Pervaz, se rend au palais impérial dans l'espoir d'obtenir la récompense promise par l'Empereur. Mais contrairement à ses attentes, Asha ne se voit offrir que le droit de choisir un époux. Fine stratège, elle choisit le Duc Carlisle Haven, fils aîné de l'empereur et prince héritier temporairement privé de son autorité, pensant que celui-ci refusera et lui versera en échange une compensation financière. Mais contre toute attente, le Duc accepte de l'épouser. Il lui promet de lui fournir les matériaux nécessaires à la reconstruction de Pervaz si Asha l'aide à récupérer le trône qui lui revient de droit.
description.id: Setelah kematian ayah dan kakak-kakaknya melawan suku barbar, Asha Pervaz turun tangan untuk menggantikan mereka. Kemenangan berhasil ia raih, namun imbalan yang ia terima hanya cemoohan rakyat dan “hak memilih calon suami”, alih-alih hadiah uang untuk membangun kembali wilayahnya. Sadar bahwa Kaisar mempermainkannya, Asha memilih Carlisle Haven Evaristo, sang putra mahkota kekaisaran yang dicabut haknya akibat skandal besar, untuk menjadi suaminya! Asha yakin Carlisle akan menolaknya, namun…
description.ko: 28년간의 전쟁을 승리로 이끈 페르바즈의 영주, '아샤 페르바즈'. 긴 전쟁으로 황폐해진 페르바즈를 위해 아샤는 황제가 약속한 승전 보상을 받으러 황실로 향한다.   하지만 돌아온 보상은 고작 <결혼 상대 선택권>.  최선의 선택으로 얼마 전 황태자 위를 박탈당한 1황자, '칼라일 헤이븐 공작'을 지목한 아샤. 거절하면 황제에게 위자료를 지급받을 생각이었으나…  "페르바즈 변경백. 그대의 청혼을 받아들이겠다."  예상과 다르게 칼라일 공작은 아샤의 선택을 받아들였다. 페르바즈에 대한 엄청난 지원까지 약속하면서…!
description.th: อาชา เปอร์เวซ ลอร์ดแห่งเปอร์เวซ ผู้นำชัยชยะมาสู่สงครามที่กินเวลายาวนานกว่า 28 ปี อาชามุ่งหน้าไปยังพระราชวังเพื่อรับรางวัลแห่งชัยชนะที่จักรพรรดิได้ให้คำมั่นไว้ โดยมีจุดมุ่งหมายเพื่อนำมาบูรณะดินแดนเปอร์เวซ ซึ่งถูกจักรวรรดิทอดทิ้งจากสงครามที่ยืดเยื้อ แต่ทว่า รางวัลเดียวที่อาชาได้รับกลับเป็น <การเลือกคู่แต่งงาน> อาชาตัดสินใจเลือกมกุฎราชกุมาร ดยุกแห่งคาร์ไลล์ ฮาเว่น ผู้ซึ่งถูกปลดจากตำแหน่งมกุฎราชกุมารเมื่อไม่นานมานี้ ถ้าเธอถูกปฏิเสธ เธอก็จะได้รับรางวัลอย่างงามจากจักรพรรดิ แต่ว่า… “มาร์คกราฟแห่งเปอร์เวซ ข้ายอมรับคำขอแต่งงานของเจ้า” ทุกอย่างกลับไม่เป็นไปตามที่คาดไว้ ดยุกแห่งคาร์ไลล์ ฮาเว่นเลือกที่ยอมรับคำขอแต่งงานของอาชา และเขายังสัญญาที่จะให้การสนับสนุนเปอร์เวซอย่างเต็มที่อีกด้วย
description.tr: Perbaz’ın 28 yıl süren savaşı zafere taşıyan lordu ‘Asya Pervaz’. Uzun süren savaşta harap olan Pervaz için Asya, imparator tarafından vaat edilen zafer ödülünü almak üzere imparatorluk ailesine gider. Ancak kendisine geri dönen tek ödül <Evlilik eşi seçme hakkı> olmuştur. Asya en iyi seçenek olarak, yakın zamanda veliaht prens ünvanından mahrum bırakılan ilk prens olan ‘Colail Haven Dükü’nü işaret etti. Eğer reddedilirse, imparatordan nafaka almaya niyetliydi… “Markiz Pervaz. Evlilik teklifinizi kabul ediyorum.” Beklentilerin aksine Colail Dükü, Asya’nın teklifini kabul etti. Pervaz’a büyük destek sözü verdi!..
description.vi: Lãnh địa Pervaz đã bị tàn phá bởi một cuộc chiến tranh. Và vĩ lãnh chúa mới của lãnh địa Pervaz này chính là Asha Pervaz. Cô được hoàng đế ban thưởng cho chiến thắng của mình. Nhưng người gặp cô lại chế giễu cô là ‘nàng công chúa man rợ’ và thật là một đề nghị vô lý khi trao quyền chọn bạn đời làm phần thưởng cho chiến thắng. Asha phải đưa ra lựa chọn tốt nhất ngay cả trong hoàn cảnh này. “Vậy…công tước Carlyle Haven đi” Cô chọn ra đại hoàng tử, người đứng đầu danh sách quý tộc và cách đây không lâu đã gây ra một vụ bê bối lớn và bị tước đoạt danh hiệu đại hoàng tử. Nếu anh ta tức giận và từ chối, cô sẽ nhanh chóng đòi bồi thường sau đó, nhưng đâu ngờ rằng Carlyle lại chấp nhận sự lựa chọn của cô. “Anh mong muốn gì ở tôi?” “Đừng bận tậm đến việc tôi làm ở Pervaz. Đừng mong rằng được đối xử như một người vợ và cũng đừng nghĩ đến việc dính líu đến phe đối lập của tôi. Và khi tôi yêu cầu thì đừng nói linh tinh gì cả, chỉ cần ký vào tờ giấy ly hôn là được” Đó là một giao dịch không có gì là không tốt đối với Asha. Cô nắm lấy tay của kẻ ngạo mạn kia mà ngay cả hoàng đế cũng coi thường. Một nụ cười đầy sức quyến rũ nở trên môi anh. “Phu nhân, sau này xin được giúp đỡ”
description.zh:
事业型男女主被迫联姻，
强强联合收获爱与权力
在长达28年的战争中，佩尔瓦兹的领主“阿西娅·佩尔瓦兹”成功地率领众人取得了胜利。为了重建因长期战争而荒芜的佩尔瓦兹，阿西娅前往皇室领取皇帝承诺的胜仗奖励。但等待她却只是区区<择偶权>，而无任何实质性的奖励。想到佩尔瓦兹的百姓连今年冬天都可能撑不过去，阿西娅只好选择刚失去皇太子身份的卡莱尔公爵作为结婚对象…“既然皇室不想让我们好过，那么就拉你们一起下水”。
description.pt-br: O senhor de Pervaz, que liderou a guerra de 28 anos até a vitória, 'Asha Pervaz'. Para Pervaz, que foi devastado pela longa guerra, Asha dirige-se à família imperial para receber a recompensa da vitória prometida pelo imperador. No entanto, a única recompensa que voltou foi o . Como melhor escolha, Asha apontou o ‘Duque de Carlisle Haven’, o primeiro príncipe que recentemente foi privado do título de príncipe herdeiro. Se ela fosse recusada, ela pretendia receber pensão alimentícia do imperador… “Marquês Pervaz. Aceitarei sua proposta de casamento. Contrariando as expectativas, o duque de Carlisle aceitou a escolha de Asha. Prometendo um tremendo apoio à Pervaz…!
description.zh-hk: 為了拯救因漫長戰爭而荒廢的領地「菲爾巴茲」，亞莎前往皇室向皇帝要求當初所承諾的戰勝補償。然而，她卻只獲得了「結婚對象選擇權」。權衡之下，亞莎認為最好的人選是不久前被剝奪皇太子地位的卡拉爾．海本公爵，假如被拒絕了，就能從皇帝那裡得到精神賠償… 「菲爾巴茲伯爵，我接受妳的求婚。」 出乎意料的是，卡拉爾公爵接受了亞莎的選擇，還承諾提供菲爾巴茲龐大的支援…！

altTitles.en: I Thought It's a Common Isekai Story
I Thought It Was a Common Possession

description.en: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?
description.ko:
그럼 그렇지, 내 팔자에 무슨 주인공이야.

남편 손에 죽을 팔자의 악녀였지만, 난 이 클리셰를 안다!​
억울하게 죽은 대가로는 꽤 괜찮다고 생각했다.
원작의 흐름에서 벗어나지 못한다는 걸 깨닫기 전까지는.
결국 원작대로 죽을 거라면, 초미남 남편에게 뽀뽀라도 해보자!

description.en:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

altTitles.hu: Még akkor is, ha a kétségbeesés megvisel

description.en:
Staying alive is a new form of entertainment.
When Dokyung, disillusioned by the harshness of life, finally resolves to call it quits, a bored demon, Hwamyung, appears before her with a particular offer. Will Dokyung, having entered into a contract with the Demon of Disillusionment, be able to flip her disastrous life upside down?

Scrap the boring, run-of-the-mill dating show! Lovers gather together to test the strength of their love. One lover seeks revenge on their swapped lover, one couple seeks fame and another seeks to test their love.
Spicy lover’s revenge set in an ultra-popular hit dating entertainment show!

altTitles.es-la: Complejo De Amigos De La Infancia

description.en: Ha-neul and Mincheol have been childhood friends for all of their lives, but their relationship takes on a whole new dynamic when they undergo a series of unexpected events. Although they vowed that they'd never be romantically attracted to each other, they just might be proven wrong... especially when things start to escalate and neither can predict where they'll end up.
description.ko: 20살에 20년지기, 평생을 함께한 소꿉친구 하늘과 민철. 그런 소꿉친구의 알고 싶지 않은 은밀..

description.en: A salaryman summons Astaroth, a Prince of Hell, to help him stop getting bullied at work.
Memes, gaming consoles, and websites turned into anime girls! Please enjoy this compilation of meme comics, oneshots, and shorts from the team behind Merryweather Comics!
description.pl: Memy z internetu zostały zmienione w słodkie anime dziewczynki.
description.pt:
(Brazilian) / Português(Brasil): ||Memes da internet se tornaram garotas fofas de anime, criado por Merryweather e com arte por Princess Hinghoi.||  


---

**Links:**  
[Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/Merryweatherey)  
[Author's Youtube (with Dubbed Comics)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvCtIO1it51jSkZGibS9R3w)
description.ru: Мемы из интернета, превращенные в милых анимешных девочек, создано Merryweather с иллюстрациями Princess Hinghoi.

description.en: A gay sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.
description.fr: Suivez les aventures d'un sorcier gay et d'une jolie prêtresse en plein cœur d'un RPG.
description.ro: Un vrajitor homosexual si o preoteasa seductiva se intalnesc din intamplare intr-un online RPG
description.pt-br: Um feiticeiro homossexual e uma sacerdotisa sedutora se cruzam em um RPG online.

title.en: You, I'll Raise You Into a Superstar!

description.en:
“Wanna work as an actor with me then?”

Byeol’s eyes were left wide open by Woohyeon, the new Executive of ‘Pine Entertainment’
Byeol, who was part of the ‘Lala Girls’ idol group that did not succeed and was on the brink of disbandment. But an offer of being an actor, not even a singer to her? Byeol opened her mouth cautiously. “Can I really succeed if I become an actor?” Byeol didn’t seem to know yet, but Woohyeon could see the ‘SuperStar Talent’ she had within her. Woohyeon said confidently, “Don’t worry, I’ll raise you into a superstar!”

Former NBA star Yoon Young-jae, who was out of the season due to an unexpected accident. An unexpected opportunity brings him back to the past.......I dream of taking a powerful leap forward once again in the NBA, where there are top stars!

After Lu Chen entered the cranial neuron quantum transferring game《Empyrean God Realm》—he found himself stripped of his human character, becoming the weakest wild monster in the game, a "Weak Gnoll." Facing players who are ready to use him to level up, Lu Chen lifts the broken Gnoll club and starts to upgrade from a Lv.1 Gnoll. As Lu Chen keeps on killing more and more species, gaining new talents, and levelling up talents, his status keeps getting enhanced. Normal, Strong, Super strong... Soon enough, he...

In Gyeongseong, the city of glittering lights and glamorous desire, Gyeongseong Detective Agency has opened its doors at No. 45, District 1, Myeongchijeong. Sohwa, a 16-year-old servant girl, has nothing to her name but her wits and bravery. When she accidentally gets caught up in a secret scheme, she meets Jeong Haegyeong, a young man running his own detective agency. Chased by memories from the past, they must work together to clear her name.

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！アンソロジーコミック

description.en:
Bocchi the Rock! anthology by various mangaka.

---
**Volume 1**
**Cover**: [Chiba Sadoru](https://mangadex.org/author/d5f4317f-c206-4421-b87e-581d65d86c13)
**Illustrations**: [Matsuda Hikari](https://mangadex.org/author/d024d115-01fd-45d7-b92f-0af7434fd4c9/matsuda-hikari), [Uzaki Uso](https://mangadex.org/author/ed1f402e-0550-446a-b3d5-8cfee979104c), Instant, [Hoshi](https://mangadex.org/author/7f08c8d4-98a3-4fee-92ff-7f618c6ab63a), [Souma Hajime](https://mangadex.org/author/4f2c1169-ad59-444c-a0a9-dab195ee35f6), HOJI, Iwawa (イワワ)

**Author list**:

2. Takeo Kyuujuu
3. Shirou Urayama
4. Totsuno Takahide
5. Uraya Nagi
6. Uchino Maiko
7. Confure
8. Fuku Kitsune
9. kashmir
10. Oomameda
**Extra comics**: Kokamumo, Konparu & Fujishima Pepo

altTitles.ja: 世界最速のレベルアップ

description.en:
It’s been 20 years since dungeons suddenly appeared in the world. Humanity got supernatural powers like Level, Status, and Skill.

Dreaming of becoming rich quickly, Amane Rin, an adventurer challenged to capture dungeons. Even though he possessed a skill unique to even adventurers, Transfer within dungeon, he was deemed as incompetent because of the poor usability of the skill. However, the turning point for him came.

After a year since he started capturing dungeons, Transfer within dungeon evolved with a level up. As a result, Rin became an existence unrestricted by the rules of the dungeon. Rin, who became the only singularity, continued to level up with overwhelming speed and climbed to the strongest position in the world in the blink of an eye.

This is the story of a boy who was looked down upon because of his incompetence but eventually became the strongest in the world.

altTitles.en: The Story Of The Reincarnation Of The Tiger

description.en:
San-gun, the owner of the mountain, was reborn as a tiger and became a spiritual creature. A girl visits San-gun, who lived in peace, and says she will serve him. San-gun tries to drive her out, but she has nowhere to go back. San-gun finally decided to take back the girl. And there are countless threats to him…

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%AD%EC%84%A0%EA%B8%B0%ED%99%98%EB%8B%B4/2496)

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30480)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77920)
description.ja:
風のように、雲のように暮らす神仙を私たちは浪仙と呼ぶ。 ひょんなことから主人公は読んでいた小説のなかの虎・山君に憑依した。 虎の体で霊物として羽化登仙（うかとうせん）していく、つまり神仙になることを決意。 白山の山君として悠々自適な生活をしていたとき、人間からの生贄として初亜という少女を捧げられる。 彼女を追い出そうとするが、彼女には行き場がない。 結局少女をそばに置いておく決心した山君だったが、そんな彼に幾多の脅威が迫ってくる･･･

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%AD%EC%84%A0%EA%B8%B0%ED%99%98%EB%8B%B4/2496)

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30480)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77920)
description.ko:
호랑이로 환생하여, 영물이 되어 살아가던 산의 주인 산군.
평화롭게 살아가던 산군의 앞에 한 소녀가 찾아오게 된다. 
대뜸 지아비로 모시겠다고 하는 소녀. 귀찮은 산군은 그녀를 내쫓으려고 하지만, 그녀는 돌아갈 곳이 없다.
결국 소녀를 거두기로 결심한 산군. 그런 그에게 수많은 위협이 닥쳐오게 되는데….

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%AD%EC%84%A0%EA%B8%B0%ED%99%98%EB%8B%B4/2496)

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30480)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77920)
description.ru:
Переродившись в тигра из романа, он жил как дух охраняющий гору Бэк. И в одну прекрасную безмятежную ночь в его жизнь ворвалась девочка. Без объяснений она начала утверждать, что теперь является его невестой. Он не раз попытался прогнать её прочь, но ей некуда было возвращаться. Так он решил оставить девочку у себя. Но он даже не представлял к каким опасностям он себя подвергает…

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%AD%EC%84%A0%EA%B8%B0%ED%99%98%EB%8B%B4/2496)

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30480)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77920)
description.zh:
转世成为一只有灵力的老虎，并成为山之主的山君，而少女楚儿的到来打乱了它平静的生活。楚儿表示将作为他的夫人服侍他，山君却不耐烦地要赶走她。然而楚儿无处可去，最终山君决定收留楚儿，殊不知危险接踵而至……

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%AD%EC%84%A0%EA%B8%B0%ED%99%98%EB%8B%B4/2496)

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30480)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77920)

description.en: A clap of thunder on a clear day sent depressed salaryman Yi Qiu ten years into the past. Now, with the opportunity to revisit highschool as a girl and interact with her former friends…and her former self…she'll encounter action, occasional romance, more tangential subplots than you can shake a stick at…and just maybe, the possibility of changing history for the better.
